articles.title: WATCH: Notre Dame explodes out of CFP gates with incredible 98-yard TD by Jeremiyah Love vs. Indiana - CBS Sports
articles.description: Love's 98-yard carry tied the longest in school history
articles.content: Notre Dame running back Jeremiyah Love etched his name into the history books by breaking off a 98-yard touchdown for the first points of the 12-team College Football Playoff. The rush tied for the l… [+1202 chars]
